title: Beckoning Cat from Right to Left

infobox.Title:: Beckoning Cat from Right to Left
infobox.Japanese title:: 右から左へ招き猫  (Migi kara Hidari e Manekineko)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ai Haibara  Kogoro Mouri  Juzo Megure  Detective Sogawa  Detective Hirota  Detective Fukui  Detective Sugita
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki and Chiemi Hironaka (sub-character)  Kenji Kato (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Tomie Kataoka as Fumie Imaoka  Asami Sanada as Chika Arai  Takashi Nagasako as Detective Sogawa  Katsumi Toriumi as Detective Hirota  Kan Tokumaru as Kenzo Kanemaru  Hiroshi Takemura as Tamotsu Ishigami

sections.Situation:
Conan and Haibara rescue a kitten from a tree and return him to his owner, Tamotsu Ishigami, the owner of a local café. A woman barges into the café exclaiming she found her boss, Kenzo Kanemaru, dead.

Conan, Haibara, Kogoro, and Ishigami enter the office to confirm the Kanemaru's death. The authorities arrive. Conan notices that someone used the vacuum and threw away its contents and also finds the paw of a broken maneki neko.
sections.People:
